title: Athletism — Grappling (Elite) — Phase 8: Specificity — Positional & Submission Chains
equipment: Mat space (tatami, wrestling mats, grappling dummy)
Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Grip tools (fat grips, gi pull‑up handles, towels)
goal: Integrate positional control, transitions, and submissions under fatigue.

warmup: Activation 6–8' (glute med, deep core, scap control)
Grappling flow drills: hip escapes, bridges, shrimps, rolls
main: Positional drills: guard pass to side control to mount 6x90''

notes: Week 1: broken scenarios. Week 2: full situational rounds.
